editorialNotes.tagline: A fun way to learn a language
editorialNotes.standard: One of our favourite apps for learning another language, the process is genuinely fun. What’s more, all those languages and games are available for free!
editorialNotes.short: Learn a new language. Join a club and get reminders to practise.

editorialNotes.tagline: Your favourite Toca apps in one
editorialNotes.standard: This brings together all the Toca Life apps, letting your beloved characters from different apps mingle in one beautiful world – a world that keeps growing with new areas to explore and characters to meet.
editorialNotes.short: Enrich your child’s imagination through creative world-building.
Enhance your child’s development with free seven-day access.
editorialNotes.tagline: Learn new words with fun games

editorialNotes.standard: With content from big names like National Geographic, this app teaches early literacy, language and maths, as well and social and emotional skills, throughout its more than 1,000 games, videos and stories.
editorialNotes.short: Fun activities and lessons to instil skills in maths, phonics and more.

editorialNotes.tagline: Learn to draw your own way

name: Colouring and drawing for kids
artistName: Bimi Boo Kids Learning Games for Toddlers FZ LLC

editorialNotes.short: Freely explore creativity through different colouring and drawing tools.

name: Baby colouring book for kids
artistName: Bimi Boo Kids Learning Games for Toddlers FZ LLC

editorialNotes.standard: Learn how to play piano with this app that listens to what you’re playing on any keyboard or piano – or lets you use an onscreen one. Within minutes you’ll be playing along with familiar songs, even if you’ve never touched a keyboard in your life.
editorialNotes.short: Personalised exercises, piano courses, hundreds of songs.
Study smarter.

name: Baby games for 2,3,4 year olds
artistName: Bimi Boo Kids Learning Games for Toddlers FZ LLC

editorialNotes.short: An all-in-one app packed with stories, rhymes, songs and games.

name: Toddler games for girls & boys
artistName: Bimi Boo Kids Learning Games for Toddlers FZ LLC

editorialNotes.standard: Taking tried-and-true methods from its parent app Duolingo, this is made for kids aged 3 to 6 and is packed with English-language games and engaging exercises – and a lot of cute monkeys.

editorialNotes.tagline: Cook up a storm in the kitchen
editorialNotes.standard: Food’s fun for everyone with Toca Boca’s second go-round in the kitchen. Choose different characters and try to please their palates by preparing fish, fruit, vegetables and more. Deciding what to serve and whether to bake, boil, fry, chop, puree or season it—or all of the above—will keep young chefs happily cooking away.
From scissors to shavers to insta-grow tonic, you’ll be astounded by all the tools you can use on your adorably animated clients. Sometimes you might even let your kids play! Sometimes.
editorialNotes.short: Become a style superstar by experimenting with different looks.

editorialNotes.standard: If there’s a topic you want to learn about, no matter how basic or advanced – whether you’re helping your child with geometry or a postgrad looking for a deep dive into microfinance – chances are this app has a video lesson for it.
editorialNotes.short: Sharpen your skills with interactive questions and videos.

name: Toddler puzzle games for kids
artistName: Bimi Boo Kids Learning Games for Toddlers FZ LLC

ios.subtitle: Learn at school, home or work

editorialNotes.standard: A winning blend of education app and game show, students can use their iPhone, iPad, or Mac to answer quiz questions in hopes of becoming the class brainiac – or create their own games to play (or study) at home.
editorialNotes.short: Create and participate in quizzes in Kahoot's fun and interactive way.
Play, build and learn.

editorialNotes.standard: With its growing list of books for all ages, to its collection of educational videos, kids will love this vast library of original content. With stories from favourites like Sesame Street, there’s always a reason to read.
editorialNotes.short: The digital library for kids to explore their interests.

name: Toddler game for 2-4 year olds
artistName: Bimi Boo Kids Learning Games for Toddlers FZ LLC

name: Baby games for 3,4,5 year olds

editorialNotes.short: Coding made easy for everyone

ios.subtitle: Learn to read, count and code!

editorialNotes.standard: Inspired by the popular education method based on a sensory and kinetic way of learning, this app provides a variety of activities to guide children ages 3–7 as they embark on their first steps in the world of schooling.
editorialNotes.short: Interactive puzzles and educational games to make learning more fun.

ios.subtitle: ABC Games with AI Baby Shark

name: Kids & Toddlers Learning Games
artistName: Bimi Boo Kids Learning Games for Toddlers FZ LLC

editorialNotes.standard: An app parents won’t have to mute in a restaurant, this is a free-play feast with switches to flip, gears to grind and blobs to plop together. Endlessly inventive, it’s a master class in how a simple app can sometimes feel the most advanced.s

name: Learning game for toddlers 2-5
artistName: Bimi Boo Kids Learning Games for Toddlers FZ LLC

editorialNotes.standard: Improve your memory, writing and reading comprehension with this powerful brain-training app via short, enjoyable mini games made to help strengthen key abilities and keep you motivated.
editorialNotes.short: Improve your learning with a personalised programme.

editorialNotes.standard: There’s no shortage of STEM-focused puzzles, levels and activities for children to devour. But this app’s standout feature is the ability for users to make and share their own content to help each other learn together.

name: Kids games for 2 - 4 year olds
artistName: Bimi Boo Kids Learning Games for Toddlers FZ LLC

editorialNotes.short: Engage kids with the essential early curriculum in a fun way.
Access personalised courses to develop your skill set.

editorialNotes.short: An all-in-one tool for painting and colouring. Enjoy daily content for free.

editorialNotes.standard: Keep meaning to read more, but just can’t find the time? This is where you’ll find thousands of summaries with key insights you can read or listen to in digestible 15-minute Blinks.
editorialNotes.short: Relatable bite-sized reads to help spark new ideas.
Develop new skills and advance in your career with thousands of online courses.

editorialNotes.tagline: Learn to code at all levels
editorialNotes.standard: Whether you want to level up your coding skills for work or start a new hobby, practise in your downtime without having to sit at a computer. You also learn why you should use one language over another, and what each one excels at.

ios.subtitle: Play and learn with Peppa Pig

name: Baby games for toddlers & kids
artistName: Bimi Boo Kids Learning Games for Toddlers FZ LLC

editorialNotes.standard: Sharpen problem-solving skills in a few minutes each day with Lumosity’s personalised challenges. They adapt to keep you challenged as you strengthen key abilities, helping you stay motivated for the long run.
editorialNotes.short: The best workout your brain’s ever had.

editorialNotes.standard: Your little ones will be building robots, designing monsters and exploring space across more than 20 games. Downloadable to play offline – perfect for long journeys!
editorialNotes.short: Go on fun-filled adventures with friendly characters all over the world.
Lay a foundation for essential Chinese language skills.

editorialNotes.standard: Learn to play guitar at your own pace, no experience necessary. Just give the app your skill level and you’ll be on your way. Grow from the basics with live feedback, which provides real-time tips so you’ll be playing lead guitar in no time.
editorialNotes.short: Strum away with step-by-step tutorials and get feedback right away.

editorialNotes.standard: As sweet and colourful as the beloved children’s book, kids can draw, colour, sing and even learn to grow strawberries for the caterpillar’s snack!
editorialNotes.short: Sing, read, play and learn with the little Caterpillar.

ios.subtitle: Chinese Leveled Reading 只为学好中文

editorialNotes.short: Let their imaginations run wild around town.
